meanings.definition: A person who abandons or deserts something or someone.
meanings.sent1: The forsakers left their village in search of a better life.
meanings.sent2: The forsakers of the old ship were never seen again.
meanings.sent3: The forsakers of the picnic forgot their sandwiches at home.
meanings.sent4: The forsakers of the team left their teammates in a tough situation.
meanings.sent5: The forsakers of the treasure map missed out on finding the hidden gold.

meanings.definition: Those who give up or renounce a belief or cause.
meanings.sent1: The forsakers of the political party formed a new group.
meanings.sent2: The forsakers of the tradition chose to celebrate differently.
meanings.sent3: The forsakers of the diet couldn't resist the cake temptation.
meanings.sent4: The forsakers of the old ways embraced modern technology.
meanings.sent5: The forsakers of the theory presented their own innovative ideas.
